page.title: 05INDUSTRY SMALL BUSINESSES
page.content: Established in Highsted eight years ago, 'Signs and LightingÂ£ is a small electrical company, employing less than ten workers. The company specializes in all types of signwork, both in terms of installation,design and emergency repairs. The factory buildings are over one hundred years and used to be a steam laundry. A small extension has been built giving extra space for machinery. Stephens and Sons are chain saw manufacturers in Rodmersham Green.It is a family business employing six people. The company sells wood burning stoves,Honda machinery and chain saws. These are imported from the United States, Japan and Germany and are sold mainly to departmental stores a local farmers. The factory owners have lived all their lives in the village.
